resource.title: "Shoe-Free Sanctuary" Signage
resource.description: Polite, culturally-aware door signage and entry mat designs explaining the shoes-off custom to prevent hygiene issues and cultural offense.
resource.painPoint: Cultural taboo of wearing shoes inside homes often violated by foreign guests, causing hygiene issues and offense to local staff.
keyFeatures: Polite Authority: "Welcome! In our culture, we leave the dust of the streets at the door."
Visual Cues: Icons of shoes/flip-flops with a "No" sign or designated rack graphic
